div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 983 Berezan' Island (anc. Leuke), 1962 Burial: late 6th-5th cent. B.C. Contents: 200+ AE . In purse or box Olbia: fish-shaped AE Disposition: Kiev Lapin, "Gruppovaia nakhodka ol'viiskikh del'fi- nov na Berezani," MASP 7 (1971), pp. 42-51
